notes: FIX: Refactored `admin.js` to use event delegation, resolving a recurring TypeError on page load and ensuring all Developer Mode buttons are functional.
FIX: Resolved a TypeError on page load by moving the 'View Use Cases' event listener in `admin.js` to ensure it's only attached after the Developer Mode elements are rendered.
FIX: Resolved multiple JavaScript errors related to event listeners being attached to elements before they were rendered.
FEATURE: Added an admin setting to enable or disable the deletion of garages.
FIX: Resolved a TypeError on the Garage Management page by initializing the `unlockedGarages` array in `main.js` and adding the missing 'Unlock Garage' modal to `index.html`.
ENHANCEMENT: Added a server-side check in `app.py` to prevent the creation of garages with duplicate names for the same user.
FIX: Resolved a TypeError on the Garage Management page by adding the missing 'Unlock Garage' modal to `index.html`.
FIX: The 'Clear All Data' function in Developer Mode no longer deletes the `feature_requests` collection, preserving valuable user feedback during data resets.
